columns.name: policy_id
columns.description: The identifier of the lifecycle policy.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the lifecycle policy.

columns.name: date_created
columns.description: The local date and time when the lifecycle policy was created.

columns.name: date_modified
columns.description: The local date and time when the lifecycle policy was last modified.

columns.name: execution_role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used to run the operations specified by the lifecycle policy.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The activation state of the lifecycle policy.

columns.name: policy_details
columns.description: The configuration of the lifecycle policy.
